mapper.insert: insert into act_print (print_id, student_id, file_name, file_url, user_print_id, user_delivery_id, print_number, both_side_flag, color_flag, sealing_flag, cover_flag, paper_size, student_remark, `status`, address_id, cover_color, fee, page_num, pay_time, print_time, delivery_time, finish_time, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark) values (#{printId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{studentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userPrintId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{userDeliveryId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{printNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{bothSideFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{colorFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{sealingFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{coverFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{paperSize,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{studentRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{addressId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{coverColor,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{fee,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{pageNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{payTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{printTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deliveryTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{finishTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select print_id, student_id, file_name, file_url, user_print_id, user_delivery_id, print_number, both_side_flag, color_flag, sealing_flag, cover_flag, paper_size, student_remark, `status`, address_id, cover_color, fee,page_num, pay_time, print_time, delivery_time, finish_time, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark from act_print where print_id = #{printId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select print_id, student_id, file_name, file_url, user_print_id, user_delivery_id, print_number, both_side_flag, color_flag, sealing_flag, cover_flag, paper_size, student_remark, `status`, address_id, cover_color, fee,page_num, pay_time, print_time, delivery_time, finish_time, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark from act_print where student_id = #{studentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select print_id, student_id, file_name, file_url, user_print_id, user_delivery_id, print_number, both_side_flag, color_flag, sealing_flag, cover_flag, paper_size, student_remark, `status`, address_id, cover_color, fee,page_num, pay_time, print_time, delivery_time, finish_time, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark,del_flag from act_print where student_id = #{studentId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and status =#{status,jdbcType=CHAR} and del_flag=0

select print_id, student_id, file_name, file_url, user_print_id, user_delivery_id, print_number, both_side_flag, color_flag, sealing_flag, cover_flag, paper_size, student_remark, `status`, address_id, cover_color, fee,page_num, pay_time, print_time, delivery_time, finish_time, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark from act_print
